comments.body: Where does those lines come from? You are not touching generator in this PR.

We're not filtering imports in the protobuf, so if we touch a type that
requires it it'll get added.

On Thu, May 5, 2016 at 2:29 AM, Wojciech Tyczynski <notifications@github.com

> wrote:
> 
> In pkg/api/unversioned/generated.proto
> https://github.com/kubernetes/kubernetes/pull/24710#discussion_r62152408
> :
> 
> > @@ -21,6 +21,7 @@ syntax = 'proto2';
> > 
> >  package k8s.io.kubernetes.pkg.api.unversioned;
> > 
> > +import "k8s.io/kubernetes/pkg/runtime/generated.proto";
> 
> Where does those lines come from? You are not touching generator in this
> PR.
> 
> —
> You are receiving this because you were mentioned.
> Reply to this email directly or view it on GitHub
> https://github.com/kubernetes/kubernetes/pull/24710/files/e416be61b90b5dc461dc8a84a94d6ecd0d76c216#r62152408

Hmm - I don't understand.
The rest of the file didn't change - so why did the imports change?

Not sure - could be an input dependency order.  I'll open an issue to have
proto only generate imports it uses.

On Thu, May 5, 2016 at 10:00 AM, Wojciech Tyczynski <
notifications@github.com> wrote:
